Grimmler/Smokescreen:



Grimmler shook his head.  That was a Predacon, not a Maximal that he had 
loved.  But his logic and neurological circuitry lost control, Grimmler 
stepping up to Bright Blade, only a few inches from walking into her.  He 
reached out, taking a hold of her right wrist, gently, rubbing it 
affectionately, the Maximal ignoring all of the warnings his 'mind' was 
sending him.

======

Smokescreen nodded.  Grimmler was taking the situation under control.  He 
couldn't see the other Maximal slightly rubbing Bright Blade's wrist.
